resources.string: This application is designed for you so that you can connect to shops of your choice ann this will enable you to purchase everything that you might need. Stay safe from covid-19 and we shall connect you to whoever has your need. We also help you if you are a seller to identify those that need your product
select the shop you would like to buy from
YOU SELECT THE TRANSACTION YOU WOULD LIKE TO DO
we are found in mbarara town near round about
press button below to locate us
you can cordinate here with your transporter and the buyer
